heart. "But where and how will my Toulon present itself?" 
Passing between the companies that had been eating porridge and drinking vodka a quarter of an hour before, he saw everywhere the same rapid movement of soldiers forming ranks and getting their muskets ready, and on all their faces he recognized the same eagerness that filled his heart. "It has begun! Here it is, dread- ful but enjoyable!" was what the face of each soldier and each officer seemed to say.
